txt.en: You have entered a part of the world with challenges and threats of much higher level than your own. While you are in this area you may attract the attention of monsters from further away than normal. You can tell when you have entered such an area when the name of the area below your mini-map turns red.

You have entered a part of the world with challenges and threats of much higher level than your own. While you are in this area you may attract the attention of monsters from further away than normal. You can tell when you have entered such an area when the name of the area below your mini-map turns red.\n\nHarvesting speed will decrease and crafting times will increase when in a dangerous area.
